events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as a refund request due to the customer wanting their money back for the wrong item sent.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case and assist the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your incorrect order.
Could you please provide a photo of the product you received, as well as your order number to verify the purchase?
Here is a photo of the product I got, and the order number is 12345XYZ. It wasn't what I ordered originally.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order immediately and provide return shipping labels.
Thanks for the quick response and clear refund process. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please send back the wrong item at no cost.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that the return process went smoothly.
Since the refund was successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this case.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on the support experience.
